title: Thunderbird, exportieren auf Smartphone
creator: lutzfrommann
content: Hallo,ich habe mein Thunderbird -Passwort vergessen/verlegt und möchte gern die Thunderbird -App auf mein neues Smartphone installieren/exportieren. Was kann ich tun? Freundliche Grüße Lutz Frommann

title: Sending email from abroad
creator: gb1201
content: Hello, my emails had been working fine it seems, but now that I've gone abroad, I've found that I can no longer send emails. I can still receive them though. I've attached a screenshot of the error message that came up when I checked the settings. Can anybody explain this and help me to rectify the problem?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) SamsungBrowser/27.0 Chrome/125.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android 14 (I think - the current one anyway!)
